exam.question: I was so _____ in today’s history lesson. I didn’t understand a thing.

answer.explain: 。句意： 今天的历史课上我很困惑。我一点儿也听不懂。neglected： 被忽视的； amused： 愉快的； amazed： 吃惊的。

sentences.sContent: I understand the text but the diagrams are confusing me.
sentences.sCn: 文字我理解，但是图表把我弄糊涂了。

sentences.sContent: ...Many business executives confuse leadership with action...

words.tran: 混乱的；混淆的；令人困惑的
可能被混淆的；可能被弄糊涂的
混乱地；受困惑地；慌乱地
使迷惑；使混乱不清；使困窘（confuse的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 使困惑， 把…弄糊涂； 混淆， 把…混同； 混乱， 搞乱
trans.tranOther: to make someone feel that they cannot think clearly or do not understand
